    • 方法详细资料

      • setActivityIntent

        public ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig.Builder setActivityIntent(Intent activityIntent)
        Sets the intent of the activity that is meant to be started in this ControlledRemoteCarTaskView.
        参数:
        activityIntent - the intent of the activity that is meant to be started in this task view.

      • setShouldAutoRestartOnTaskRemoval

        public ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig.Builder setShouldAutoRestartOnTaskRemoval(boolean shouldAutoRestartOnTaskRemoval)
        Sets the auto restart functionality. If set, the ControlledRemoteCarTaskView will restart the task by re-launching the intent set via setActivityIntent(Intent) when the task is removed. The task might get removed because of multiple reasons like:
        • Due to memory pressure
        • Due to the apk update
        • etc.
        参数:
        shouldAutoRestartOnTaskRemoval - denotes if the auto restart functionality should be enabled or not.

      • setShouldCaptureGestures

        public ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig.Builder setShouldCaptureGestures(boolean shouldCaptureGestures)
        Enables the swipe gesture capturing over ControlledRemoteCarTaskView. When enabled, the swipe gestures won't be sent to the embedded app and will instead be forwarded to the host activity.
        参数:
        shouldCaptureGestures - denotes if the swipe gesture capturing should be enabled or not.

      • setShouldCaptureLongPress

        public ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig.Builder setShouldCaptureLongPress(boolean shouldCaptureLongPress)
        Enables the long press capturing over ControlledRemoteCarTaskView. When enabled, the long press won't be sent to the embedded app and will instead be sent to the listener specified via ControlledRemoteCarTaskView#setOnLongClickListener(View.OnLongClickListener).

        If disabled, the listener supplied via ControlledRemoteCarTaskView#setOnLongClickListener(View.OnLongClickListener) won't be called.

        参数:
        shouldCaptureLongPress - denotes if the long press capturing should be enabled or not.

      • build

        public ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig build()
        Creates the ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig object.
